title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: August 15, 2023, 09:00:46 AMLast edit: August 15, 2023, 09:40:53 AM by cafter
content: who are your favorite bitcointalk user and what special you like about them?for me:franky1: because he/she is frank with everyone and have knowledge about many fields. teaches something new in easy way, goes in deep of any topic and think both of it's advantages and disadvantages.o_e_l_e_o: he/she tell complex things in very easy way so that anyone beginner can understand, have in deep knowledge of bitcoin and blockchain, contributor.I have many other favorite members also.. but i want to know other's so i listed two of my best.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Shouldn’t this post be in the reputation board?Op to me, my favourite Bitcointalkers are those that have help me in anyway that they can whether through a direct explanation to my question or an explanation that they did for someone else back then even before I became a member of the forum and even those that created tools for the forum to help forum members understand and use the forum with more ease. And if I should bring out a list of them they are gonna be more than hundreds of them so, I don’t really like the idea of singling one or two out of them when they all helped me the same way.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on August 15, 2023, 09:00:46 AMsnipThere are many of my favorite members and many haters.  But I don't want to be good or enemy to anyone by mentioning their names. I prefer to keep it hidden and I think everyone should keep it a secret because it reveals that making someone happy and someone unhappy is not desirable for smart thinking people. So keep it secret and just follow him
